sentences.en: By the early 19 th century fantasies of an Amur breadbasket had revived.
sentences.cn: 1820年左右还出现了殖民夏威夷的奇思妙想.

sentences.en: China is already suffering from acute water shortages in its breadbasket north.
sentences.cn: 中国北方主重粮食产地已面临严重缺水的问题.

sentences.en: It's one of the commuter suburbs of Tokyo and it's known as the city's breadbasket.
sentences.cn: 它是东京郊区的通勤之一,它作为城市的粮仓众所周知的.

sentences.en: Today, North America is not only the world's breadbasket, but its feed bag as well.
sentences.cn: 今天, 北美不仅是世界的粮仓, 而且也是世界的饮料库.

words.tran_cn: 胃；面包篮；产粮地区；大型空投炸弹
